question: Which of the following are true? (Choose two)

answers.A: You can modify the main route table.
answers.B: You can’t modify the main route table.
answers.C: By default, the main route table doesn’t contain a route to an Internet gateway.
answers.D: By default, the main route table always has a route to an Internet gateway.
answers.E: By default, the main route table contains a route to an Internet gateway.
